Package ddf.security.sts.claimsHandler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeMapLoader
    Logic that handles loading attribute maps from an incoming format and returning it as a Map.
    BindMethodChooser  
    ClaimsHandlerManager
    Creates and registers LDAP and Role claims handlers.
    ContextSourceDecrypt
    This class is only meant to decrypt an encrypted password that is set to the ldap/roles claims handler.
    LdapClaimsHandler  
    RoleClaimsHandler
